summary: This document contains various FAA certificates and registrations related to the Gulfstream Aerospace aircraft, including airworthiness certificates and special registration numbers. It details the ownership and maintenance responsibilities for the aircraft, as well as compliance with FAA regulations. This document contains various FAA Form 337 submissions and compliance statements related to alterations and repairs made to Gulfstream Aerospace Model GV-SP aircraft, specifically SN 5173. It details the work accomplished, compliance with airworthiness standards, and the individuals involved in the certification process. This document contains various FAA compliance statements and airworthiness certificates related to the Gulfstream Aerospace Corporation GV-SP (G550) aircraft, serial number 5173. It includes requests for replacement certificates, modifications, and alterations made to the aircraft, as well as details about the involved parties and compliance with aviation regulations. This document contains various FAA forms related to the airworthiness and modifications of Gulfstream GV-SP aircraft, specifically focusing on alterations and compliance with aviation regulations. It includes details about the aircraft's registration, modifications made, and compliance with safety standards. This document contains technical specifications and maintenance requirements for modifications made to a Gulfstream GV-SP (G550) aircraft, including the installation of various systems and equipment. It references FAA approvals and outlines the necessary documentation for continued airworthiness. This document contains various statements of compliance with Federal Aviation Regulations for modifications made to Gulfstream Aerospace aircraft, specifically the GV-SP model. It includes details about the installation of systems and components, as well as the necessary certifications and approvals required for compliance. This document contains various references to airworthiness certificates and applications related to Gulfstream Aerospace Corporation. It discusses the maintenance and certification requirements for aircraft, specifically the Gulfstream GV-SP (G550) model. The document is subject to a protective order, indicating sensitive information may be included.

persons.name: Brent Archibald
persons.context: Brent Archibald is mentioned as the owner and certificate operator of Gulfstream Aerospace Corporation GV-SP (G550) and is involved in the request for a replacement airworthiness certificate.

persons.context: Richard Munkvold is identified as the Chief Financial Officer who authorized Khera Turner to act on behalf of the company regarding FAA applications.

events.title: Issuance of Airworthiness Certificate
events.description: The FAA issued an airworthiness certificate for the Gulfstream Aerospace aircraft, confirming it met safety and operational standards.

events.title: Special Registration Number Assignment
events.description: A special registration number was assigned to the Gulfstream aircraft, allowing for its operation under specific conditions.

events.title: Flammability Test Approval
events.description: Approval of flammability test results for materials used in the aircraft's interior.

events.title: Flammability Test Report
events.description: Completion of a flammability test for various materials used in the aircraft's interior.

events.title: Modification Approval
events.description: Approval of engineering design data for modifications made to the Gulfstream Model GV-SP aircraft.

events.title: Replacement Airworthiness Certificate Issued
events.description: A replacement airworthiness certificate was issued for the Gulfstream GV-SP aircraft due to a registration change.

events.title: Flammability Test Results Approved
events.description: Flammability test results for the aircraft's interior refurbishment were approved, demonstrating compliance with safety standards.

events.title: Airworthiness Compliance Statement Issued
events.description: A statement of compliance with airworthiness standards was issued for the Gulfstream GV-SP aircraft.

events.title: Approval for Return to Service
events.description: The aircraft was inspected and approved for return to service after modifications were completed.

events.title: Application for Special Airworthiness Certificate
events.description: An application was submitted for a special airworthiness certificate for the Gulfstream model GV-SP (G550).

events.title: FAA Compliance Statement Issued
events.description: The FAA issued a statement of compliance for modifications made to Gulfstream Aerospace aircraft, specifically the GV-SP model.

events.title: FAA Compliance Statement Issued
events.description: The FAA issued additional compliance statements for various modifications made to Gulfstream Aerospace aircraft.

keyFacts: The airworthiness certificate for the Gulfstream aircraft was issued on March 7, 2008.

Jason Tighe signed multiple FAA forms related to aircraft maintenance and alterations.
The aircraft is registered under the special registration number N550GP.
